About Me

Passionate about innovation at the intersection of AI and business

Technical Leadership

Based in Laval, Quebec, I'm a Senior Consultant at VIA Rail Canada with extensive experience in system solutions and data integration. My journey spans over a decade of delivering enterprise-level technical solutions.

Technical Excellence

Specializing in Python programming, data analysis, and system integration. I leverage modern technologies and methodologies to build robust solutions that drive operational excellence.

Quality & Process

Certified Professional Scrum Master with deep expertise in quality assurance and process optimization. I focus on delivering high-quality solutions that meet stringent enterprise standards.
